    Package Description
    org.wikidata.wdtk.datamodel.implementation
    Basic implementation for objects representing Wikibase data and related factories.

      class  SitesImpl
      Implementation of the Sites interface that allows sites to be registered.

    • Uses of Sites in org.wikidata.wdtk.dumpfiles

      Methods in org.wikidata.wdtk.dumpfiles that return Sites 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sites MwSitesDumpFileProcessor.getSites()
      Returns the information about sites that has been extracted from the dump file(s) processed earlier.
      Sites DumpProcessingController.getSitesInformation()
      Processes the most recent dump of the sites table to extract information about registered sites.
